trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Rahway
There were no other sightings in Rahway on or around June 21st 2005
Summary: The UFO was maybe 1-4 miles away
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsI was taking out the trash in front of my house when my father yelled at me and I turned and saw a big oval shape object in the sky. At first I thought it was a plane, but the colors were just to different to be a plane. The colors were green, red, orange, and blue. The object was flying when it stopped turned in a 360 degree angle. and then went out of sight. At first I was really scared then I was overjoyed because all my life I've wanted to see an UFO. I lost sight when it went behind alot of trres.
